short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for walmart orders management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We help organize and update .xlsx from the Walmart Seller Portal to make it easier for users to:
- Convert to .csv 
- Add specific weights to UPCs
- Add tracking #'s automatically to .xlsx

Instructions:
1. Set default address.
2. Go to Walmart Dashboard and select all your pending orders and download a .xlsx file (excel file)
3. Take this original file and upload it in the `convert to .csv` tab
4. Upload .csv to google sheets and edit weight
5. Download the .csv and generate tracking numbers
6. To upload tracking # to your .xlsx, go to `Upload Tracking`, on the top-right corner, upload your ORIGINAL .xlsx
7. Paste in your tracking # & hit `Transfer` *
8. Upload your tracking to Walmart

*Make sure the order QTY matches with the order itself otherwise will only mark one unit as shipped.
